mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM DEALER_INFO JOIN USER_INFO ON DEALER_ID = USER_ID WHERE DEALER_ID = #{DEALER_ID}

SELECT MANUFACTURER, MODEL, VEH_NUM, STATUS, CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_DTL_ID FROM CAR_DETAILE_INFO JOIN CAR_INFO ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_ID = CAR_INFO.CAR_ID JOIN SALE_STATUS ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.STATUS_ID = SALE_STATUS.STATUS_ID WHERE STATUS = 'sale' AND DEALER_ID = #{DEALER_ID}

SELECT SALE_DATE, MANUFACTURER, MODEL, PRICE, CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_DTL_ID FROM CAR_DETAILE_INFO JOIN SALE_STATUS ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.STATUS_ID = SALE_STATUS.STATUS_ID JOIN CAR_INFO ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_ID = CAR_INFO.CAR_ID WHERE STATUS = 'soldout' AND DEALER_ID = #{DEALER_ID}

SELECT CAR_DTL_ID, MANUFACTURER, VEH_NUM, MODEL, PRICE, STATUS, SALE_DATE FROM CAR_DETAILE_INFO JOIN CAR_INFO ON CAR_DETAILE_INFO.CAR_ID = CAR_INFO.CAR_ID JOIN SALE_STATUS ON SALE_STATUS.STATUS_ID = CAR_DETAILE_INFO.STATUS_ID WHERE CAR_DTL_ID = #{CAR_DTL_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE SALE_STATUS JOIN CAR_DETAILE_INFO ON SALE_STATUS.STATUS_ID = CAR_DETAILE_INFO.STATUS_ID SET STATUS = #{STATUS}, SALE_DATE = sysdate() WHERE CAR_DTL_ID = #{CAR_DTL_ID}
